text: @paulsperry_ @realDonaldTrump I keep seeing this as a right-lunatic-fringe-wing argument, if I knew who the coronavirus PC police were I'd ask them. What I do know is that last nights "rally" was maskless. We are in the middle of a pandemic, going maskless is unsafe.
